snippet: There is a clear distinction between LeBron James and Carmelo Anthony in how they have balanced the art of playing a team sport with the equally tricky but more desensitized business of professional basketball.
abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Basketball column examines LeBron James's decision to return to Cleveland Cavaliers and Carmelo Anthony's decision to re-sign with New York Knicks; holds that clear distinction between James and Anthony in how they have balanced art of playing a team sport with equally tricky but more desensitized business of professional basketball.
lead_paragraph: There is a clear distinction between LeBron James and Carmelo Anthony in how they have balanced the art of playing a team sport with the equally tricky but more desensitized business of professional basketball.

headline.seo: LeBron James and Carmelo Anthony Show Big Differences of Copycat Narrative
headline.main: Beyond Looking Out for No. 1, Always Putting the Team First
headline.print_headline: Beyond Looking Out for No. 1, Always Putting the Team First
